attributes.action: Increase nursing staffing levels in Acute Care Settings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition government to increase the amount of nursing staff on acute wards.  This increase will allow nurses sufficient time and resourses to provide quality holistic nursing care, rather than the basic essentials.  Patients should have nurses who are able to spend time with them, allowing their psychological and social needs to be attended to.  Nurses, when were you last able to spend quality time with your patients?
